titles.title: SAFE Advertising Act of 2022

A bill to establish protections for radio and television stations that provide advertising services to cannabis-related legitimate businesses and service providers for such businesses, and for other purposes.
SAFE Advertising Act of 2022
Secure And Fair Enforcement Advertising Act of 2022

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Secure And Fair Enforcement Advertising Act of 2022 or the SAFE Advertising Act of 2022
This bill prohibits the Federal Communications Commission from taking certain adverse actions against a radio or television station that advertises cannabis or hemp businesses or service providers if the station is licensed in a state where cannabis or hemp products are legal and other conditions are met. It also specifies that proceeds from transactions with legitimate businesses related to cannabis or hemp shall not be considered proceeds from an unlawful activity or require the denial of federal benefits.
